places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Krishna Classic
address: V2MJ+49W, Bangalore - Mangalore Hwy, Behind Bus Stand, B.C Road, Bantwal, Karnataka 574219, India

reviews.text:
Location is great as it's center on B C road . Fish food is good. Muru tawa fry and fish meals recommended. Bangude pulimunchi was bad biryani was decent.

This place has veg restaurant and bar with non veg also. Comparatively good pricing and AC options eventhough th ehotel looks Pale with old ambience. Good place for a dinner and lunch

Tasty and Amazing breakfast. The veg Krishnima restaurant, with which the hotel is equipped is easy to recommend to anyone who wants to satisfy their tastebuds with great authentic South Indian Delicacies like Rava Sheera, Masala Dosa and the list goes on.....
Great Staff too.
This is a 1 star hotel with no amenities. No Wifi or internet. Please stay away from this hotel. Staff and receptionist lady is rude and not welcoming! Book at Birwa or some decent hotel.

Tasty food.
Tried dilkush, jelly with icecream and triple sunde.
Dilkush 5*
Triple sunde 4*
Jelly with icecream : 2*
(In jelly with icecream there are more jellys than icecream)
Price: reasonable
The room was comfortable and fairly clean. Ac working well. Hot water in tap and toilet was fairly clean.

places_with_reviews.name: Krishnananda Lodging

reviews.text:
Lodge has AC and Non-AC rooms, With Geyser Installed so we can get 24/7 hot water facility.
Rooms are well maintained and has wardrobe, TV and Balcony.
Parking space available in Basement.
Good new place. Good rooms. Great food. Good friendly service. Clean
Best room in Bantwal at reasonable price. Well maintained compared to others lodges like Krishnim and Akshaya. Lift is not built completely yet, but rooms are well maintained and clean
Near and tidy place. New building work ample parking
Foods was very nice and service also speed

places_with_reviews.name: Srinivas Residency
address: V2MG+55V, B.C Road, Bantwal, Karnataka 574219, India

reviews.text:
Been here once and I had a bad experience.
Location is easy to find on the highway and has ample parking facility. The rooms are okish with nothing to complain. The only time I have been here, I had a troublesome night due to bed bugs.
Hotel is in good location. But Ac rooms are not maintained properly. No TV connection, water leakage in bathroom.

Old building, most of the time vacant... stayed there for 1 night...food is horrible...just threw it in bin... room service guy gives lecture about hotel policy and what not they serve...no blankets available for AC room LOL.....no hot water....no cable tv....there is nothing available....
One of the best restaurants in B.C.Road. service is really slow but food is great. I would recommend to try Ghee roast and vuruval at this place.
It's awesome. Food are delicious. Rooms are pretty clean and quiet good.
